alert.note: Alert for Flathead, Mission Valleys; West Glacier Region (Montana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Missoula (Western Montana and Central Idaho)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 29 at 11:51AM MDT by NWS Missoula
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of central Lake and eastern Sanders Counties through 1230 PM MDT... At 1149 AM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Pablo, or 7 miles south of Polson, moving north at 10 mph. This storm will produce gusty winds and occasional lightning for those boating on Flathead Lake for the next 1 hour. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Polson, Ronan, Pablo, Rocky Point, Jette, Kerr, Turtle Lake, Kings Point, Big Arm, Finley Point and Dayton. This includes Highway 93 N between mile markers 45 and 72, and between mile markers 79 and 84. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: This storm may intensify, so be certain to monitor local radio stations and available television stations for additional information and possible warnings from the National Weather Service.

area.areaDesc: Flathead, Mission Valleys; West Glacier Region
